page.title: 02Class 5 Organisation
page.content: Class 5 consists of 30 boys and girls aged 9 and 10.Our teacher is Miss Bailey.Every child in the class was born between April and October 1975. We divide our school up into years, first,second,third and fourth years. This depends on how old you are.Our class consists of some of the oldest second years and the youngest third years.We have 21 boys,and 9 girls,9 are second years and 21 are third years.{This the timetable. 08.50]09.05 Bell,Registration 09.05]09.25 Assembly in hall 09.25]10.25 Lessons 10.25]10.40 Play-time 10.40]12.00 Lessons 12.00]13.15 Lunch-break 13.15]14.20 Lessons 14.20]14.30 Play-time 14.30]15.35 Lessons 15.35 Home-time
